segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I see the woman focused on drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the water disaster at her sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is creating quite the flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the cabinets if not stopped.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are ignoring safety for cookie fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the wobbly stool, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might drop everything if it tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her cookie with open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the slippery floor adds extra risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom discovering this later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could shatter in a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tied-back curtains let in light on the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden is pristine, inside is a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR
